files.patch:
@@ -218,1 +218,1 @@
-    <Field type="Symbol" name="source" label="Location" />
+    <Field type="Symbol" name="source" label="Source" />

@@ -113,0 +113,18 @@
+[jvm.class-definitions]
+label = "Class Definitions"
+table = "COLUMN 'Time', 'Thread', 'Class', 'DefiningClassLoader', 'Source'
+         FORMAT none, none, none, missing:null-bootstrap, truncate-beginning
+         SELECT startTime, eventThread, definedClass, definingClassLoader, source
+         FROM jdk.ClassDefine
+         GROUP BY definedClass
+         ORDER BY startTime ASC"
+
+[jvm.classes-by-source]
+ label = "Classes by Location"
+ table = "COLUMN 'Source', 'Count'
+          FORMAT truncate-end, none
+          SELECT source, COUNT(*) AS C
+          FROM jdk.ClassDefine
+          GROUP BY source
+          ORDER BY C DESC"
+
@@ -577,3 +595,6 @@
-table = "COLUMN 'Time', 'Loaded Class', 'Load Time'
-         SELECT startTime,loadedClass, duration AS D
-         FROM ClassLoad ORDER BY D DESC LIMIT 25"
+table = "COLUMN 'Time', 'Loaded Class', 'Source', 'Load Time'
+         FORMAT none, none, truncate-beginning, none
+         SELECT CL.startTime, CL.loadedClass, CD.source, CL.duration AS D
+         FROM ClassLoad AS CL, ClassDefine AS CD
+         GROUP BY CL.loadedClass, CD.definedClass
+         ORDER BY D LIMIT 25"
